title: Is Spider-Man under-qualified to be a superhero? - Quora

response.answer_text: from a superpower standpoint absolutely not. he's pretty packed with powers. superstrengthsuperagilityability to cling to wallsspidersensesuperhuman reactionnatural webslingers (in certain formats of the story, self invented chemical/mechanical in the original) and the ability to customize the shape of the webs from strands to balls to nets.genius level science intellect (in certain formats, gifted level in others. enough to be able to invent many of his gadgets on his own)master level tailoring skills. (that costume doesn't fix itself)master level photographer
